attributes.action: use all means at his disposal to involve the police force or HMCE  in investigating possible fraud and tax evasion over MP expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
